subject: Fw: Thank you, we are accepting your loan request
body:
Your credit history doesn't matter to us!
 
If you OWN property and want IMMEDIATE cash to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you THIS EVENING (hurry, this offer will expire NOW):
 
$483,000+ loan
 
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest monthly payments!
 
Hurry, when our best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply finish this quick form... 
 
Don't worry about approval, your credit score will not disqualify you!
 
http://timelyytfahionn.com/
